Plot: A young advertising executive's life becomes increasingly complicated when, in order to impress her boss, she pretends to be engaged to a man she has just met.
Title: Picture Perfect
Writer: Arleen Sorkin (story), Paul Slansky (story), May Quigley (story), Arleen Sorkin (screenplay), Paul Slansky (screenplay), Glenn Gordon Caron (screenplay)
Actors: Jennifer Aniston, Jay Mohr, Kevin Bacon, Olympia Dukakis
